title: Invalid guides link in quarkus-azure-functions extension
body:
### Describe the bug

The metadata for quarkus-azure-functions extension, https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/blob/c7d6ba22a1942640c8964df60f79e7b96032bb95/extensions/azure-functions/runtime/src/main/resources/META-INF/quarkus-extension.yaml, has the following guide link:

```
  guide: "https://quarkus.io/guides/azure-functions"
```

That guide doesn't exist, so we either need to make it exist, or comment out the reference to it in the metadata. I'm not sure which is best, which is why I've raised an issue rather than just doing the change. 

### Expected behavior

_No response_

### Actual behavior

_No response_

_No response_
